headline: Is KKR (KKR) Still Attractive After Recent Share Price Pullback?
summary: If you are wondering whether KKR is starting to look interesting at its current price, this article will walk through what that might mean for value focused investors. KKR's share price closed at US$114.98, with a 6.9% decline over the last week, a 10.6% decline over the last month, a 10.8% decline year to date, but gains of 102.8% over three years and 173.9% over five years, which may have caught your eye if you follow longer term moves as well as recent pullbacks. Recent headlines around...
